channel.title: Flexdashboard on Somtom's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Flexdashboard on Somtom's Blog

item.title: Dynamically Rendered Flexdashboard Pages Using RMarkdown Childs
item.description: Dashboards are nice tools when it comes to analyzing quickly changing data. Nevertheless, you may also use them for reporting purposes by taking snapshots. R has a nice library called flexdashboard which you can use for creating dashboards out of RMarkdown files. During a project at work we found a nice solution for dynamically rendering flexdashboard pages by using R Markdown child templates which I want to share with you in this blog post.
